name: Dock 365
tagline: Best SharePoint Intranet Portal for your Business
description: At Dock, we've been working with enterprise businesses for years to create one-of-a-kind company intranets. We hear every day about the struggles of getting all of your employees to adopt the technology. We get it, SharePoint can be confusing and hard to personalize. We spent years learning what businesses need in an intranet portal and created the perfect, out-of-the-box solution: Dock.
